art.author: rhonda_kay
art.post: If you enjoyed “Heaven is for Real”, you should check out a book that is touching the Midwest.  It’s a true bundle of hope and inspiration.  “A Mother’s Journey of Love, Loss & Life Beyond” by Jennifer Scalise.  http://www.jenniferscaliseauthor.com  You walk away with an amazing strength and this book is sure to touch the world!
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
